alert.note: Alert for Logan; Mingo (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:10AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mingo and western Logan Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1009 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oppy, or 10 miles north of Williamson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delbarton, Red Jacket, Holden, Chattaroy, Mount Gay-Shamrock, Verdunville, Dingess, Myrtle, Varney, Meador, Lenore and Breeden. This includes Route 119 between mile markers 1 and 26, and near mile marker 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
